title: Migrate to the `polkadot-sdk` umbrella crate
body: Some crates cannot be used from the umbrella crate, due to either their use of (proc) macros or features which aren't exposed from the umbrella crate.

title: Polkadot v1.15.0
body: Updates to the latest polkadot-sdk v1.15.0 stable LTS release. The next update will be in a year.

title: add support for async backing
body: Introduce support for async backing to the `ParachainSproofInherentProvider`

title: Fix ctrl-c bug
body: Fixes a bug that prevents the node from shutting down when it receives a ctrl-c signal. It was caused by blocking on the essential task, instead of spawning it with the task manager

title: Add crate metadata for crates.io publishing
body: Adds the relevant crate metadata to allow publishing sc-simnode

title: Upgrade to polkadot-sdk@v1.7.0
body:
Now that the polkadot-sdk is (somewhat) available on crates.io, simnode will now follow the polkadot-sdk version releases.
This is just an initial PR to bring it up to date.

title: subxt fix
body:
- Pointed to crates.io `subxt` version 0.31.0
- Regenerated and fixed codegen files

title: add standalone runtime
body: Standalone runtime and node for Babe and Grandpa

title: Optimize CI
body: Eliminate redundant build (check job already builds)

title: Refactor/API
body:
Rename the `simnode` client function to `start_simnode`
Remove redundant types and shrink `start_simnode` definition
